Interface Deployer.Listener

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
OSGiDeploymentListener
Enclosing interface:
Deployer
public static interface Deployer.Listener extends EventListener

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    onCreated(ContextHandler contextHandler)
    Called when a ContextHandler is first seen by the Deployer.
    default void
    onDeployed(ContextHandler contextHandler)
    Event called when a ContextHandler is both started and added to the ContextHandlerCollection.

    Event called when a ContextHandler is added to the ContextHandlerCollection.

    Event called when a ContextHandler is failed.

  • Method Details

    • onCreated

      default void onCreated(ContextHandler contextHandler)
      Called when a ContextHandler is first seen by the Deployer.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler seen.

    • onDeploying

      default void onDeploying(ContextHandler contextHandler)
      Event called when a ContextHandler is added to the ContextHandlerCollection. A ContextHandler is deployed when it is both added and started.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler added.

    • onStarting

      default void onStarting(ContextHandler contextHandler)
      Event called when a ContextHandler is starting.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler starting.

    • onStarted

      default void onStarted(ContextHandler contextHandler)
      Event called when a ContextHandler is started. A contextHandler is deployed when it is both added and started.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler added.

    • onDeployed

      default void onDeployed(ContextHandler contextHandler)
      Event called when a ContextHandler is both started and added to the ContextHandlerCollection.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler deployed.

    • onUndeploying

      default void onUndeploying(ContextHandler contextHandler)
      Event called when a ContextHandler is removed from the ContextHandlerCollection. A ContextHandler is undeployed when it is both removed and stopped.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler undeploying.

    • onStopping

      default void onStopping(ContextHandler contextHandler)
      Event called when a ContextHandler is stopping.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler stopping.

    • onStopped

      default void onStopped(ContextHandler contextHandler)
      Event called when a ContextHandler is stopped.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler stopped.

    • onUndeployed

      default void onUndeployed(ContextHandler contextHandler)
      Event called when a ContextHandler is both stopped and removed from the ContextHandlerCollection.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler undeployed.

    • onFailure

      default void onFailure(ContextHandler contextHandler, Throwable cause)
      Event called when a ContextHandler is failed.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler that failed.
      cause - The cause of the failure.

    • onRemoved

      default void onRemoved(ContextHandler contextHandler)
      Called when a ContextHandler is last seen by the Deployer.
      Parameters:
      contextHandler - The ContextHandler seen.
